name: PLUG (br_blaze)
description:
The Red and Blue dimensions are collapsing and all of reality as we know it will cease to exist! Whether it be shifting between the two dimensions or dodging dangerous obstacles, it's up to you as the Dimensional Plug to connect yourself to the outlets across space and restore reality! 

Modes: 

Normal - Select and play through the 15 levels as normal

Deathless - You only get one chance at it all! If you die you have to start over at level 1

Known Bugs:

- Can sometimes get stuck in walls when shifting between dimensions

- Level complete sound stacks when failing the level and still colliding with the goal

- Level 14's Enemy can still kill you in the Blue dimension

- Not really a bug but I'm bad at managing sound volumes so some things may be loud so consider yourself warned :)

Note: I lack the knowledge of making it run on the page

This game was made for the BenBonk Game Jam #3 so I hope you enjoy what I have to offer :)
